ygData.subject: Re: Clarity
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes they stack ... Yes they stack ... I know John did some timings on this a while back.  If he has them handy still I can post them to the website.  Go
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: "Eqbards@..." <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: [eqbards] Clarity
>Date: Tue, 16 Nov 1999 15:07:21 -0600
>
>Being a newly 32nd bard I'm getting hit with various questions and claims
>regarding my 32nd level Clarity song. I have read previously on this list
>that our song does stack with an Enchanter's Clarity spell. Does anyone
>have hard number with what percentage increase there is? Is it in fact
>Enchanter Clarity + Bard Clarity?
Yes they stack


>The one thing that I've been told that I
>had no previous knowledge of is that Bard Clarity stacks with Bard Clarity.
>Is this so? If so, is it Bard Clarity + Bard Clarity,
Yes they stack

>or a lesser
>percentage of increase. What about three or more bards in a group, etc.?
>
>Crier Sharpsong
>EverQuest - Pretend it's a game.
>
I know John did some timings on this a while back. If he has them handy
still I can post them to the website. Go here for more info:
http://rgonzalez.net/EQSongs/Songs/Song32.htm



Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server

EQ Bard Song Analysis
